items.title: Ubisoft Launches New Tencent-Backed Subsidiary Vantage Studios
items.summary:
Ubisoft has officially launched its new subsidiary company called Vantage Studios. The Tencent-backed “creative house” will now be overseeing its parent company’s largest franchises, such as Assassin’s Creed, Far Cry, and Rainbow Six, moving forward. The new subsidiary is the result of a €1.16 billion (~RM5.73 billion) investment from Tencent, which was announced earlier in […]

items.title: Amazon will ship this 48- by 28-inch electric standing desk to your doorstep for $80 (Reg. $150)
items.summary:
Marsail 48- by 28-inch Electric Standing Desk

Buy for $80 (Reg. $150)

What we love

If your desk has seen better days or if you’re just starting to build out your office, this is a solid price point to cash in on for a standing desk. Generally speaking a 48-inch surface is a common width for an entry-level standing desk, but where this desk differs is in its depth, which spans 28 inches. That tacks on an addition 4 inches which can be helpful if you want to use a larger display and not be right up against it.

items.title: The last PDF tool you’ll ever need is on sale for $25 with a limited-time code (Reg. $100)
items.summary:
PDFs are supposed to make life easier — until you actually need to edit one. That’s where PDF Converter & Editor comes in. Instead of struggling with expensive software or clunky online tools, you get a simple, powerful solution that keeps layouts, images, and links intact while letting you convert, edit, and manage your files. The best part? You only pay once. Right now, a lifetime license is just $24.99 with code PDF15 through October 12.

items.title: This new smart body measuring tape with USB-C charging and 180-day battery life just fell to $27
items.summary:
RENPHO Smart Body Measuring Tape

Buy for $27 (Reg. $32)

Clip the on-page 15% off coupon.

What we love

While you can simply keep an eye on overall weight and gauge trends that way, folks trying to build muscle and lose weight may not see numbers change all that much as muscle replaces fat. That’s one way a measuring taple like this can help. You can keep tabs on your waist size, muscle size, and more.

items.title: Score the The Hobbit: 75th Anniversary Edition w/ Tolkien’s own drawings as low as $2 today
items.summary:
The Hobbit: 75th Anniversary Edition

Buy for $2 (Reg. $10)

What we love

Well, what is there to say about The Hobbit – it’s an absolute classic, and one some would say is much better in book form. This copy happens to be special one with a deluxe hardcover, a short intro from Christopher Tolkien, and “all of Tolkien’s own drawings and full-color illustrations.” Obviously the lowest price is for the Kindle Edition with audio/video, but you can land the physical copy down at $12.50 right now too.

items.title: Add four Edison bulbs with Matter support to your smart home while they’re just $7.50 a pop
items.summary:
Linkind Matter Edison Bulbs (4-pack)

Buy for $30 (Reg. $38)

What we love

These days, any smart bulbs I pick up have Matter support. Most of our readers know by now that this is a simple way of saying that something works with all of the major smart home ecosystems like Apple, Google, Alexa, Samsung, and more. These bulbs fit the bill, and won’t break the bank either at just $7.50 each. Given the fact that they offer up Edison styling, this is a solid price point worth cashing in on.
